CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 11, 1965, pg. 9, reads: "PLATFORM GUESTS AT CENTRAL - Last Sunday was Scholarship Day at Central Baptist Church, and The Courier photographer took and aerial view of the platform guests, while Dr. Sidney P. Marland, superintendent of schools for the City of Pittsburgh, spoke at the morning worship hour. Among the platform guests are the Rev. Isaac Green, pastor; Mrs. Edith Venable, chairman of the church's board of Christian education; Eric Springer; Neal Huguley; Mrs. Gladys McNairy, chairman for Scholarship Day; Otis Edwards, Dr. James and the Rev. J. A. Bradley, assistant pastor of the church. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Superintendent of Pittsburgh Public Schools Sidney P. Marland speaking at podium, with men and women seated behind him including Rev. Isaac Green, Edith Venable, Eric Springer, Neal Huguley, Gladys McNairy, Otis Edwards, Dr. James, and Rev. J. A. Bradley, for Scholarship Day at Central Baptist Church
